headline.main: TOKYO FORCES 'DRIFT' TO SIBERIAN BORDER; London Reports Japanese Move Toward Blow at Russia

lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 1 (U.P.) -- Japanese land and air forces are "drifting toward the Manchukuo border," from where they can invade Russia "at their own chosen moment," the British military commentator said today.
abstract: Brit mil commentator repts Jap forces moving toward Manchukuo
snippet: LONDON, July 1 (U.P.) -- Japanese land and air forces are "drifting toward the Manchukuo border," from where they can invade Russia "at their own chosen moment," the British military commentator said today....
